about_the_game:
Odin's Ring is a game based on the 9 worlds of Norse mythology. This isometric style will contain a fusion of popular JPRG and MOBA game mechanics. Midgard is under attack, help the people of Midgard reclaim the land and ward off invaders. While the gods deal with a greater threat the mighty warriors of Valhalla return to restore peace in their homeland.

Players can explore fictitious worlds, fight mythical creatures and harvest rare materials. Enhance your experience with unlockable characters and accessories which all contribute toward a comprehensive upgrade and levelling system

Valhalla awaits..

name: Odin's Ring

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 8000 MB available space
